answers.answer: Thanks for those kind words i'ts just what i needed right now. It is so easy to complain about what we have or havent got, We forget what we have.As for me i stopped complaining about my weight and started to do something about it and now im 102 lbs lighter, still a long way to go but getting there.I consider myself blessed apart from arthrites,Diabetes and a Heart Attack a couple of weeks ago i am healthy, I'm not wealthy but i am rich in so many ways, I have a roof over my head and food in the cupboards,a Husband and family that loves me, Friends that care,what more do i need. So What Am I  Going To Do With What I Have? Im going to be more thankful, im going to support others on there journey,theres lots of things i dont have that i WANT but i have everything i NEED
That's the attitude elaine! You Can Do This!
Excellent post Skailark!  I like the way you think.  I have a strong heart and mind.  I'm going to use those to help others and to help myself as well.

question: People Always Tell Me..."If I Only Have This I Would Be This.....", "If I  Only Had That I Would Be That....", But What People Rarely Say To Me Is What They Are Doing With Waht They Have...For Me This Is What I Feel. I Doesn't Matter What You Have or What You Don't . What Matters Is What You Do With What You Have. Never Let Some Excuse Of Not Having Something Stop You From What You Want To Become or What You Want To Achieve. At TheEnd Of The Day Your Courage And Attitude Is Going To Determine The Outcome.I know This Weight Loss Journey Can Be Hard And Testing...But I Know Each Of You Have The Heart Of A Soldier To Keep Your Chin Up And Am Confident You Will Do Your Best With What You Are Given And With What You Have!  I Know There Is A Hero Within Each Of You!
title: What Are You Going To Do With What You HavE?
